name: Fast Slide 3D
description:
How good would it be to play Fast Slide 3D with the up-to-date hot songs in the world?
Easy to play with a simple controller to enjoy spectacular EDM rhythm game experiences. Fly and touch the sky! Time your movement by holding and releasing at the right time

MAIN FEATURES:
- Lively 3D design
- Simple gameplay and 1-hand control
- Popular music songs
Let us bring you your best relaxing time!
